title: Crypto Fund Trader Check website
description: Crypto Fund Trader, based in Switzerland and established in November 2022, is a crypto-only prop trading firm offering 1 Step, 2 Steps and Instant programs. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $200,000. Platforms supported include MT5, Match Trader, CFT Platform and Bybit. The firm offers over 500 tradable instruments with leverage of 1:100. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: 000 for 1 and 2 step combined. Max 3 instant accounts up to $30k.
Reverse trading rule: Closing all open trades in one direction before opening opposite direction if simultaneous duration >= 60 seconds.
Gambling rule: Daily and/or per-trade profit limit is $10

payout_policy.processing_time: 1 & 2-step: 15 trading days or 30 calendar days. Instant: On demand (after 10% profit) or 15/30 days.
payout_policy.details: Ascend Program: Payout on demand after passing evaluation, then account closed.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Copy trading between Ascend accounts is prohibited.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Allowed (implied, no explicit ban mentioned except no HFT/Arbitrage typically seen in industry, but text only says 'Reverse trading rule' and 'Gambling rule' specifically).
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: Not specified in scraped text (only mentions Restricted Countries n/a).
firm_rules.news_trading: 1 Phase, 2 Phases and Instant accounts: Allowed. Ascend accounts: Not allowed within 2 mins before/after high-impact news.
forbidden_strategies: 000 for 1 and 2 step combined. Max 3 instant accounts up to $30k.
Reverse trading rule: Closing all open trades in one direction before opening opposite direction if simultaneous duration >= 60 seconds.
Gambling rule: Daily and/or per-trade profit limit is $10

seo_content:
Crypto Fund Trader Technical Infrastructure

Crypto Fund Trader, based in Switzerland and established in November 2022, is a crypto-only prop trading firm offering 1 Step, 2 Steps and Instant programs. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $200,000. Platforms supported include MT5, Match Trader, CFT Platform and Bybit. The firm offers over 500 tradable instruments with leverage of 1:100. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
